name: Slumber's Lumber
description: Welcome to Slumber's Lumber, the most environmentally conscious game about deforestation you'll ever play! Take on the role of a corporate evil lumber mill manager and prove that you can prioritise profits over the planet like a pro. Chop down trees, turn them into lumber, and sell them for big bucks, all while trying to keep your reputation meter from plummeting faster than a sapling in a hurricane. Who says you can't destroy the planet and have a laugh doing it? Play Slumber's Lumber now and show Mother Nature who's boss!
